TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpPostedFileBase extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Serves as the base class for classes that provide access to individual files that have been uploaded by a client.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFileBase> class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFile> class. The <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFileBase> class lets you create derived classes that are like the <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFile> class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members that have customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing.
The <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFileWrapper> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFileBase> class. The <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFileWrapper> class serves as a wrapper for the <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFile> class. At run time, you typically use an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFileWrapper> class to call members of the <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFile> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance. This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the size of an uploaded file, in bytes.
Docs.value: The length of the file, in bytes.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the MIME content type of an uploaded file.
Docs.value: The MIME content type of the file.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the fully qualified name of the file on the client.
Docs.value: The name of the file on the client, which includes the directory path.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a object that points to an uploaded file to prepare for reading the contents of the file.
Docs.value: An object for reading a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SaveAs(string filename) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the file to save.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, saves the contents of an uploaded file.
